support_me_page.title: Support My Work
support_me_page.description: If you find my work helpful and would like to support me, you can donate through the following methods. Every contribution is greatly appreciated! üôè
support_me_page.thank_you_message: Your support means the world to me and helps me continue creating valuable content. Whether it's a small coffee or a generous donation, every contribution makes a difference!
